    • validateName

      public String validateName(String name)
      Validates name field.
      Parameters:
      name - given name field
      Returns:
      name if it is valid
      Throws:
      NullFieldException - if name is null or empty
      WrongFieldException - if name contains commas

    • validateX

      public int validateX(String xStr)
      Validates x field.
      Parameters:
      xStr - string representation of x coordinate
      Returns:
      x coordinate if it is valid
      Throws:
      WrongFieldException - if value of x coordinate is greater than 201
      NumberFormatException - if it can't parse x coordinate to int

    • validateY

      public int validateY(String yStr)
      Validates y field.
      Parameters:
      yStr - string representation of y coordinate
      Returns:
      y coordinate if it is valid
      Throws:
      WrongFieldException - if value of y coordinate is less than or equal to -440
      NumberFormatException - if it can't parse y coordinate to int

    • validateHealth

      public Double validateHealth(String healthStr)
      Validates health field.
      Parameters:
      healthStr - string representation of health field
      Returns:
      health value if it is valid
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if it can't parse health field to Double
      WrongFieldException - if health field is less than or equal to 0

    • validateHeartCount

      public int validateHeartCount(String heartCountStr)
      Validates heartCount field.
      Parameters:
      heartCountStr - string representation of heartCount field
      Returns:
      heart count if it is valid.
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if it can't parse heartCount field to int
      WrongFieldException - if value of field heartCount is less than or equal to 0 or greater than 3.

    • validateId

      public long validateId(String idStr, List<Long> ids)
      Validates id field.
      Parameters:
      idStr - string representation of id field.
      ids - list of currently validated ids
      Returns:
      id if it is valid
      Throws:
      IdCollapseException - if given id is contained in used ids list
      NullFieldException - if it can't parse marinesCount field to long

    • validateCreationDate

      public Date validateCreationDate(String creationDateStr) throws ParseException
      Validates creationDate field.
      Parameters:
      creationDateStr - string representation of creationDate field
      Returns:
      creation date if it is valid.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the beginning of the specified string cannot be parsed.

    • validateSpaceMarine

      public SpaceMarine validateSpaceMarine(String name, String xStr, String yStr, String healthStr, String heartCountStr, String categoryStr, String meleeWeaponStr, String chapterName, String marinesCountStr, String idStr, List<Long> ids, String creationDateStr) throws ParseException
      Validates SpaceMarine object.
      Parameters:
      name - given name field
      xStr - string representation of x coordinate
      yStr - string representation of y coordinate
      healthStr - string representation of health field
      heartCountStr - string representation of heartCount field
      categoryStr - string representation of category field
      meleeWeaponStr - string representation of meleeWeapon field
      chapterName - given chapterName field
      marinesCountStr - string representation of marinesCount field
      idStr - string representation of id field.
      ids - list of currently validated ids
      creationDateStr - string representation of creationDate field
      Returns:
      SpaceMarine object if all it's fields are valid.
      Throws:
      ParseException - if the beginning of the specified string cannot be parsed.
      NumberFormatException - if it can't parse some numeric field
      IllegalArgumentException - if it can't parse some enum field
      IdCollapseException - if given id is contained in used ids list.

    • validateSpaceMarine

      public SpaceMarine validateSpaceMarine(String[] args)
      Validates SpaceMarine object.
      Parameters:
      args - - string array with object's fields in this order: name, xStr, yStr, healthStr, heartCountStr, categoryStr, meleeWeaponStr, chapterName, marinesCountStr
      Returns:
      SpaceMarine object if all it's fields are valid
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if it can't parse some numeric field
      IllegalArgumentException - if it can't parse some enum field
      IdCollapseException - if given id is contained in used ids list
